title: Take 24% off this HomeKit power strip and power your office with smarts and Siri
content:
Macworld

We all need power strips around the house, but wouldn’t it be awesome to have a smart one? Well, the meross smart power strip is on sale for $32.78 at Amazon right now, down from its usual $43, an impressive 24 percent discount and just pennies away from the all-time low. Not only does it feature plenty of outlets and ports, but it’s also compatible with the Apple HomeKit, which perfectly integrates into the Apple ecosystem.

Equipped with 4 individually controlled outlets and 4 group-controlled USB ports, this power strip enables you to efficiently manage your devices. Each outlet supports up to a 15A maximum load, while the USB ports provide up to a combined 4.0A, making it ideal for charging phones, tablets, and your Apple Watch.

One of the standout features of this power strip is the HomeKit remote control. Basically, if you use a HomePod, Apple TV 4K, Apple TV HD, or an iPad acting as a HomeKit bridge, you can control the outlets on the power strip from anywhere. And of course, you can even Siri voice controls for extra convenience. And it’ll save you money too with scheduling so you can set timers to power down and save energy when devices are not in use or left on by mistake.

So go grab this excellent deal on the Meross Smart Power Strip for a superb opportunity to take your smart home setup to the next level.
